{{cpp/ranges/title|range_reference_t|range_const_reference_t|range_rvalue_reference_t|range_common_reference_t}}
{{cpp/ranges/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|ranges}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; ranges::range R &gt;
using range_reference_t = std::iter_reference_t&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;R&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|1=
template&lt; ranges::range R &gt;
using range_const_reference_t =
    std::iter_const_reference_t&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;R&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; ranges::range R &gt;
using range_rvalue_reference_t =
    std::iter_rvalue_reference_t&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;R&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=4|since=c++20|1=
template&lt; ranges::range R &gt;
using range_common_reference_t =
    std::iter_common_reference_t&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;R&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Used to obtain the reference type of the iterator type of range type {{tt|R}}.
@2@ Used to obtain the constant reference type of the iterator type of range type {{tt|R}}.
@3@ Used to obtain the rvalue reference type of the iterator type of range type {{tt|R}}.
@4@ Used to obtain the common reference type of the iterator type of range type {{tt|R}}.
